task.summary: Trying to implement background region detection
Scan period is now configurable and works in background.
Improved handling of multiple logins / beacon UUIDs
Bluetooth check nu maar 1x bij opstarten. Refresh login entries bij weergeven help fragment.
Display UUID and RSSI of beacons.

Added scrollviews for small screens, Improved stability of beacon tracker, some lifecycle-related bugfixes, implemented list sorting for students and assistants, show corresponding course name with beacons.
Fully implemented assistant and student merging from multiple logins/apis. Many other improvements.
Fully implemented assistant and student merging from multiple logins/apis. Many other improvements.
Code reformatted, removed old logging code, update to Gradle 1.0.0-rc4

MESSAGE.value: Trying to implement background region detection
Scan period is now configurable and works in background.
Improved handling of multiple logins / beacon UUIDs
Bluetooth check nu maar 1x bij opstarten. Refresh login entries bij weergeven help fragment.
Display UUID and RSSI of beacons.

Added scrollviews for small screens, Improved stability of beacon tracker, some lifecycle-related bugfixes, implemented list sorting for students and assistants, show corresponding course name with beacons.
Fully implemented assistant and student merging from multiple logins/apis. Many other improvements.
Code reformatted, removed old logging code, update to Gradle 1.0.0-rc4
